opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Landreneau, Secretary for the Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries v. Pelts & Skins, LLC

opinion:
544 U.S. 1058

LANDRENEAU, SECRETARY FOR THE LOUISIANA DEPARTMENT OF WILDLIFE AND FISHERIES
v.
PELTS & SKINS, LLC.

No. 04-23.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 31, 2005.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Reported below: 365 F. 3d 423.

2

Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of Johanns v. Livestock Marketing Assn., ante, p. 550.
